product_name: The North Face Kirata Quarter-Zip Top - Women's
long_description: Enjoy the luxurious feel of the women's Kirata Quarter-Zip Top from The North Face the next time temps drop and you want to be either outside hiking or climbing, or just inside and cozy. Fabric of main body is textured and abrasion-resistant bubble-knit fleece; side panels are stretch knit for freedom of movement. Extra-soft cypress fabric lines the back of the neck. Top offers outstanding UPF 50+ sun protection for cold, sunny days outdoors. Kirata Quarter-Zip Top from The North Face features ruching at the neck and contoured seams for style.
short_description: Enjoy the luxurious feel of the women's Kirata Quarter-Zip Top from The North Face the next time temps drop and you want to be either outside hiking or climbing, or just inside and cozy.
